product_name: Columbia Vertical Convert 2.0 Interchange 3-in-1 Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: When skiing the steep and deep, you can count on the women's Columbia Vertical Convert(TM) 2.0 Interchange 3-in-1 insulated jacket as a solid mountain performer. It features three options in one. Omni-Tech(R) nylon shell is breathable and abrasion resistant, and has a waterproof coating; seams are sealed in critical places to keep moisture from entering. Adapt to the situation! Wear the waterproof, breathable shell with zip-in liner jacket for maximum weather protection, or wear either piece on its own. Removable zip-in/zip-out polyester liner jacket features 100g polyester insulation; jacket includes zippered handwarmer pockets. Liner includes Omni-Shield(R) advanced repellency to resist water and stains at the surface. Includes waterproof zippered handwarmer pockets, goggles pocket and an interior security pocket. Removable, adjustable storm hood. Columbia Vertical Convert 2.0 Interchange 3-in-1 insulated jacket has a drawcord hem and adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs that seal out the elements and retain warmth.
short_description: When skiing the steep and deep, you can count on the women's Columbia Vertical Convert(TM) 2.0 Interchange 3-in-1 insulated jacket as a solid mountain performer. It features three options in one.
